chapter.simpara: This document details the overall approach to testing, and provides documentation and insight into the structure and proper use of the other work products developed during Usage Modeling and Test Planning, namely, the Usage Models and Statistical Test Cases. This includes important details like how to run the tests, how the tests will be measured, as well as the order in which testing should be conducted. It does not include the actual usage models or test cases, but covers everything else created or designed during the Usage Modeling and Test Planning process.
